title: Is this job for me? No. 5. Making boots and shoes
brief_description: Made for showing to children of school-leaving age. This film takes the student on a tour of a boot and shoe factory, illustrating firstly the methods by which a single craftsman makes a pair of shoes and then the way in which the same job is done using modern machinery.
